name: Agnete
description:
Made with bitsy for 🌊 seafolk 🌊 (bitsy jam) 🌊 #bitsyjam

---

Agnete, based on the ballad Agnete og Havmanden.

A woman leaves her human children for a merman; when her first husband passes, she comes back for the church bells. She is faced with a decision...

Return to live on land, abandoning her still-child aquatic children for her land family

OR

Return to live in water, abandoning her now-adult land children for her aquatic family
